description: This file is a frontend HTML page that provides a user interface for viewing and browsing databases and their tables, along with displaying table data. It includes styles, DOM elements, and JavaScript code for fetching data from backend APIs to dynamically render database lists, tables, and data entries.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from the backend API and renders them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates the UI accordingly.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database and renders them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data rows from a specific table and renders the table view.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates and injects HTML for displaying table data with headers and rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell contents, handles nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for better viewing of long text or objects.
